) } } AssetDetails.propTypes = { assets: PropTypes.func.isRequired, errors: PropTypes.object.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => { console.log(ownProps) console.log(state) let id = ownProps.match.params.id; return { assets: state.assets.assets, asset: state.assets.assets.data.find(asset => asset._id === id) } }; export default connect( mapStateToProps, { getAssets } )(AssetDetails)
